content.raw: Depends on the script typical compile times are between 150 ms and 500ms but can be higher for more complicated scritps. The scripts run for about 1 second + programming devices which is another half a second. So ratio compiling is about 3 -10 times faster than running. (this is with all that mercurial code removed before that we ran into BLACS being faster than compilation)
